description:
Jessica Paxton interviews Shannon Shaw of Shannon & the Clams
Support The Current: https://support.mpr.org/youtube  

Bay Area four-piece indie-rock band Shannon and the Clams visited The Current for a studio session hosted by Jessica Paxton. After the performance, frontperson Shannon Shaw (and her dog, Spanky Joe), hung out for a heartfelt conversation with Jessica about the inspirations behind the album, "The Moon Is In The Wrong Place." Watch the full interview above.

Credits
Guest – Shannon Shaw of @shannonandtheclams 
Host – Jessica Paxton
Audio Engineer – Josh Sauvageau
Video Director – Erik Stromstad
Camera Operators – Erik Stromstad, Peter Ecklund
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
